function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Capture of airborne viruses","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of viruses","Mitigation":"Use HEPA air filters and proper ventilation systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air ventilation systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Pathogen detection and analysis","Impact":"Inability to detect and analyze pathogens in the environment","Mitigation":"Regular environmental testing and sampling","Technologies":"RT-qPCR, multiplex qPCR, statistical analysis","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Statistical analyses","Impact":"Inaccurate interpretation of pathogen detection data","Mitigation":"Use appropriate statistical methods and software for analysis","Technologies":"R Studio, statistical software","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research organizations, data analysis teams"}]}
